page.title: 06Life styles
page.content: {Life style}is very much dependant on the{income}and locality of the person concerned. In this area we have a great cross section of{socioeconomic groups,ranging from the upper middle {classes}to the lower working class. There is generally a friendly {atmosphere}between the classes and the village hall in Kenninghall is the centre of many social functions. East Anglia in general has a high percentage of{car ownership,}and this block is no exception. This is due to the severe lack of{public transport. The recent opening of{antique}shops in Kenninghall reflects the change of wealth in the area.
